about_the_game:
"Whoa... You're Kiichi, aren't ya?!"
My next-door neighbor is none other than Hinako, the older girl who I used to know back during my childhood. All the memories from my childhood come flooding back to me. It's just as nostalgic as it is surprising.

FEATURES


  • A heartfelt visual novel
  • Japanese voice acting

STORY


When Kiichi moves into a new apartment after transferring from a technical school to a university, his next-door neighbor happens to be Hinako, a former delinquent once feared by many back in their hometown.

Seeing Hinako is still as beautiful and cool as when they were younger digs up long-buried memories, rekindling Kiichi’s forgotten crush. However, there is one poignant difference this time around—Hinako is now a married mom!

CHARACTER


Hinako Kurose
Voice: Kazuha
Hinako’s tumultuous journey into delinquency sprouted from cracks in her strained relationship with her father. In her late teens, she entered into a dubious relationship with her current husband and eventually married him.

With her unapologetically wild demeanor, she wields a tongue that could cut glass. However, beneath this rough exterior is a whole lot of heart—which tends to land her in her fair share of overly friendly situations...

Due to her challenging upbringing, she dreams of building a joyful and happy home.

name: Saving Mrs. Hinako

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Pentium3 1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: In this visual novel by Studio Pork, make a strong-willed yet acquiescent, pure-hearted but rebellious housewife fall in love with you!
